import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import LinearProgress from '@material-ui/core/LinearProgress' import { withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import * as S from './styles/HomeStyles' import ReactLoading from 'react-loading' import Radio from '@material-ui/core/Radio' import RadioGroup from '@material-ui/core/RadioGroup'; import FormControlLabel from '@material-ui/core/FormControlLabel'; import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import FormLabel from '@material-ui/core/FormLabel' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import { makeStyles, } from '@material-ui/core/styles' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ margin: { width: '50%', borderRadius: 5, border: '1px solid black', height: '3.5rem', backgroundColor: 'red', boxShadow: '0 0 15px red', textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '1.5rem', zIndex: 5, [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { width: '30%', }, }, headText:{ width: '20%', fontSize: '1rem', textShadow: '1px 1px 5px white', textalign: 'center', [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { width: '30%', fontSize: '1.3rem', textShadow: '3px 1px 5px white', }, transition: theme.transitions.create(['border-color', 'box-shadow']) } })); const Home = () => { /* const [heros, setHeros] = useState([]) */ const [heroi, setHeroi] = useState([]) const [load, setLoad] = useState('none') const classes = useStyles() const [enableStart, setEnableStart] = useState(true) const [enableResult, setEnableResult] = useState(false) const [enableNext, setEnableNext] = useState(false) const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState('none') const [itemMaq, setItemMaq] = useState('none') const [result, setResult] = useState('') const [user, setUser] = useState(0) const [maq,setMaq] = useState(1) const [cardUser, setCardUser] = useState() const [cardMaq, setCardMaq] = useState() const letras = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVYWXZ" const BorderLinearProgress = withStyles((theme) => ({ root: { height: 15, borderRadius: 5, }, colorPrimary: { backgroundColor: 'grey', }, bar: { borderRadius: 5, backgroundColor: 'red', }, }))(LinearProgress); async function fetchData(search) { setLoad('block') let response = await axios(`https://www.superheroapi.com/api.php/3992681667526682/search/${search}`) await setHeroi(response.data.results) await setLoad('none') } const handleHeroi = (e) => { setEnableStart(!enableStart) setEnableResult(!enableResult) let sort = (Math.random(letras.length) * 10) let searc = Math.round(sort) let searchHero = letras[searc] console.log(searchHero) fetchData(searchHero) } const handleResult = () =>{ if(cardUser > cardMaq){ setResult('Ponto Jogador') } else if(cardMaq > cardUser){ setResult('Ponto MÃ¡quina') } else { setResult('Empate') } setItemMaq('block') console.log(`Jogador = ${cardUser} - Maquina = ${cardMaq}`) setDisplayText('block') } const handleNext = () =>{ setUser(user+2) setMaq(maq+2) setItemMaq('none') setDisplayText('none') setEnableNext(!enableNext) } const handleChange = (e) => { console.log(`user = ${e.target.value}`) if(e.target.value != 'null'){ setCardUser(e.target.value) } else { setCardUser(0) } setEnableNext(!enableNext) //console.log(`Maquina = ${e.target.value}`) } const handleMaq = (e) => { console.log(`maquina = ${e}`) if(e != 'null'){ setCardMaq(e) } else { setCardMaq(0) } } function displayItem(){ if(heroi != ''){ return( <>

  • ID: {heroi[user].id} - Nome: {heroi[user].name}

      • Powerstats
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence)}} value={heroi[user].powerstats.intelligence != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.intelligence : 0} control={} />
      Intelligence {heroi[user].powerstats.intelligence != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.intelligence : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.strength)}} value={heroi[user].powerstats.strength != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.strength : 0} control={} />
      Strength {heroi[user].powerstats.strength != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.strength : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.speed)}} value={heroi[user].powerstats.speed != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.speed : 0} control={} />
      Speed {heroi[user].powerstats.speed != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.speed : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.durability)}} value={heroi[user].powerstats.durability != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.durability : 0} control={} />
      Durability {heroi[user].powerstats.durability != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.durability : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.combat)}} value={heroi[user].powerstats.combat != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.combat : 0} control={} />
      Combat {heroi[user].powerstats.combat != 'null' ? heroi[user].powerstats.combat : 0}%

  • ID: {heroi[maq].id} - Nome: {heroi[maq].name}

      • Powerstats
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence)}} value={heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence : 0} control={} />
      Intelligence {heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.intelligence : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.strength)}} value={heroi[maq].powerstats.strength != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.strength : 0} control={} />
      Strength {heroi[maq].powerstats.strength != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.strength : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.speed)}} value={heroi[maq].powerstats.speed != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.speed : 0} control={} />
      Speed {heroi[maq].powerstats.speed != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.speed : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.durability)}} value={heroi[maq].powerstats.durability != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.durability : 0} control={} />
      Durability {heroi[maq].powerstats.durability != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.durability : 0}%
      {handleMaq(heroi[maq].powerstats.combat)}} value={heroi[maq].powerstats.combat != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.combat : 0} control={} />
      Combat {heroi[maq].powerstats.combat != 'null' ? heroi[maq].powerstats.combat : 0}%
    ) } } return( {result} {displayItem()} ) } export default Home
